original_body_lines: @⁨SUB-Lucky Aiya⁩ Dhamma serman at Sirikotha A dharma deshana (serman) was held by Venerable Aludeniye Subodhi Thera at UNP Headquarters Sirikotha today to mark Poson Poya. UNP Buddhist society members and Sirikotha staff participated in the sermon and other programs held to mark the event. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
